name: Gruesome Claim
description:
Gruesome Claim is a game where you play as an insurance investigator checking in on some particular items from an insurance claim. The tenant of the apartment isn't home, but unfortunately for you, some thing else is.

Explore the apartment looking for the items on the claim while avoiding a gruesome death. Complete a secret objective to unlock the true ending (3 gems).

This game is eligible for my Free Key Program!

I recently had an idea for a program where people can "pay" for my games using alternate forms of value. In short, do something that helps me, and you get a free key. I have more details in the application form. But generally if you do a good critical review, let's play video, or anything of that sort, I'm willing to give you a free key so you can do that. If you are interested in this, submit an application here: https://forms.gle/Kbdpwn5xgnb6BuTx8 I'm literally just one person though, so please remember to be patient. It might take me a few days to get back to you.

For more information on the Complementary Asset Pack, see this page.

See in-game credits for attributions.

I'm feeling pretty good about this game, I'm getting the feel for making horror (to the point that I started seeing "Teardrop" in the shadows of my home at night.) So hopefully this one spooks ya!~
